content.question: The primary goal of the passage is to

choices.label: compare two recent scientific studies on global warming
explore the relationship of air traffic to atmospheric temperatures
argue for the necessity of limiting air travel in Europe
review a chronological series of studies on cirriform clouds

content.answer: explore the relationship of air traffic to atmospheric temperatures

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
